table.comment: stores item information for an auction
table.name: civicrm_auction_item

field.name: auction_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_auction for this item

field.name: donor_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_contact, who donated this item

field.name: auction_item_type_id
field.title: Auction Item Type ID
field.comment: Auction Type ID.Implicit FK to civicrm_option_value where option_group = auction_item_type.

field.name: auction_item_category_id
field.title: Auction Item Category ID
field.comment: Auction Category ID.Implicit FK to civicrm_option_value where option_group = auction_item_.

field.name: title
field.title: Item Name
field.comment: Required item title

field.name: description
field.title: Description
field.comment: Optional description of the product/premium.

field.name: note
field.title: Special Note
field.comment: Optional specific instructions / restrictions regarding this item.

field.name: lot_number
field.title: Lot Number
field.comment: lot numbers associated with this item. could be a range. automatically computed.

field.name: url
field.comment: optional URL of website to associate with item.

field.name: sku
field.title: SKU
field.comment: Optional product sku or code.

field.name: options
field.title: Options
field.comment: Store comma-delimited list of color, size, etc. options for the product.

field.name: image
field.title: Image
field.comment: Full or relative URL to uploaded image - fullsize.

field.name: quantity
field.title: Quantity
field.comment: Number of Units availaible.

field.name: retail_value
field.title: Price
field.comment: Retail value of item.

field.name: min_bid_value
field.title: Minimum Bid
field.comment: Minimum bid allowed for this item.

field.name: min_bid_increment
field.title: Minimum Bid Increment
field.comment: Minimum bid increment allowed for this item.

field.name: buy_now_value
field.title: Buy Now Value
field.comment: The amount that the item can be bought for immediately

field.name: bid_start_date
field.title: Bid Start Date
field.comment: Date and time bidding starts.

field.name: bid_end_date
field.title: Bid End Date
field.comment: Date and time bidding ends.

field.name: is_active
field.comment: Is this item active/approved and available

field.name: is_group
field.comment: Does this item group other items?

field.name: parent_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_auction_item, if this item is part of an item group

field.name: creator_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_contact, who created this item

field.name: created_date
field.comment: Date and time when item was created.

field.name: approver_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_contact, who approvedthis item

field.name: approval_date
field.comment: Date and time the item was approved.
